sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"灵魂，心灵"之意。
means: soul ： 指超越身体之外，永远存在的无形的东西，即所谓灵魂，亦可作人解。
ghost ： 普通用词，主要指死者的灵魂。
spirit ： 当指与body相对而言的所谓灵魂时，可与soul互换使用，但强调人的精神素质，也指神仙、精灵等。

word_mean: 通过蒸馏得到的或易挥发的液体中的任何一种，如酒精
醑剂：挥发性物质的酒精溶液

sentence.Network_en: The requirement for work permits violates the spirit of the 1950 treaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 对工作许可证的要求违反了1950年条约的精神。

sentence.Network_en: This adaptation perfectly captures the spirit of Kurt Vonnegut's novel.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次改编非常好地抓住了库尔特·冯内古特小说的精髓。

sentence.Network_en: Alaskan Eskimos believe that every living creature possesses a spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿拉斯加的爱斯基摩人认为每一个活着的生物都有灵魂。

jx.jx_en_mean: join wholeheartedly in an event, especially one of celebration and festivity
jx.jx_cn_mean: 全身心地投入活动（尤指节庆活动）中

lj.lj_ly: he &B{entered into the spirit of} the occasion by dressing as a pierrot.
lj.lj_ls: 他打扮成丑角的模样全身心地投入了这个活动。

jx.jx_en_mean: in thought or intention though not physically

lj.lj_ly: he couldn't be here in person, but he is with us in spirit.
lj.lj_ls: 他虽然不能亲自到这来，但他的精神是和我们在一起的。

phrase.cizu_name: the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)someone has good intentions but fails to live up to them
jx.jx_cn_mean: (谚)心灵愿意，但肉体却软弱了；心有余而力不足

jx.jx_en_mean: when someone feels inclined to do something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在某人想（或喜欢）做某事时，只要某人高兴

lj.lj_ly: he can be quite candid when the spirit moves him.
lj.lj_ls: 只要他高兴，他有时也会相当坦率的。

jx.jx_en_mean: (in animistic and occult belief) the non-physical realm in which disembodied spirits have their existence
jx.jx_cn_mean: （在万物有灵论和神秘信仰中的）灵魂世界

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French, from Latin spiritus 'breath, spirit', from spirare 'breathe'

entry.def: Your spirit is the part of you that is not physical and that consists of your character and feelings.

example.ex: The human spirit is virtually indestructible...
example.tran: 人的精神实际上是不可摧毁的。

example.ex: Marian retains a restless, youthful spirit, in search of new horizons.
example.tran: 玛丽安怀着一颗年轻、不断进取的心去寻求新的天地。

entry.def: A person's spirit is the non-physical part of them that is believed to remain alive after their death.

example.ex: His spirit has left him and all that remains is the shell of his body.
example.tran: 他已灵魂出窍，剩下的只是他的躯壳。

entry.def: A spirit is a ghost or supernatural being.

example.ex: ...protection against evil spirits.
example.tran: 避邪

entry.def: Spirit is the courage and determination that helps people to survive in difficult times and to keep their way of life and their beliefs.

example.ex: She was a very brave girl and everyone who knew her admired her spirit.
example.tran: 她是个非常勇敢的女孩，认识她的人都敬佩她的勇气。

entry.def: Spirit is the liveliness and energy that someone shows in what they do.

example.ex: They played with spirit.
example.tran: 他们打得生龙活虎。

entry.def: The spirit in which you do something is the attitude you have when you are doing it.

example.ex: Their problem can only be solved in a spirit of compromise...
example.tran: 他们的问题只能通过妥协来解决。

example.ex: They approached the talks in a conciliatory spirit.
example.tran: 他们抱一种和解的态度去参加谈判。

entry.def: A particular kind of spirit is the feeling of loyalty to a group that is shared by the people who belong to the group.

example.ex: There is a great sense of team spirit among the British Olympic squad...
example.tran: 在英国的奥运代表团中有一种强烈的团队精神。

example.ex: The president has appealed to the Brazilian people for patriotism and community spirit.
example.tran: 总统已经呼吁巴西人民要有爱国情怀和集体主义精神。

entry.tran: 精神(指某一群体特有的思想、信念、目标)
entry.def: A particular kind of spirit is the set of ideas, beliefs, and aims that are held by a group of people.

example.ex: ...the real spirit of the Labour movement.
example.tran: 劳工运动的精髓

entry.tran: (法律、协议等的)原意,实质，精神
entry.def: The spirit of something such as a law or an agreement is the way that it was intended to be interpreted or applied.

example.ex: The requirement for work permits violates the spirit of the 1950 treaty.
example.tran: 对工作许可证的要求违反了 1950 年条约的精神。

entry.def: You can refer to a person as a particular kind of spirit if they show a certain characteristic or if they show a lot of enthusiasm in what they are doing.

example.ex: I like to think of myself as a free spirit...
example.tran: 我愿意把自己看成是个无拘无束的人。

example.ex: He was the founder and guiding spirit of New York's Shakespeare Festival.
example.tran: 他是纽约莎士比亚戏剧节的创始人及领导者。

entry.def: Your spirits are your feelings at a particular time, especially feelings of happiness or unhappiness.

example.ex: At supper, everyone was in high spirits...
example.tran: 晚餐时，每个人都兴致勃勃。

example.ex: A bit of exercise will help lift his spirits.
example.tran: 进行一点儿体育锻炼能帮助他改善情绪。

entry.def: If someone or something is spirited away, or if they are spirited out of somewhere, they are taken from a place quickly and secretly without anyone noticing.

example.ex: He was spirited away and probably murdered...
example.tran: 他被秘密带走，可能被杀害了。

example.ex: His parents had spirited him away to the country...
example.tran: 他的父母偷偷地将他带到了该国。

entry.def: Spirits are strong alcoholic drinks such as whisky and gin.

entry.tran: (用作燃料、清洗等用途的)酒精
entry.def: Spirit or spirits is an alcoholic liquid that is used as a fuel, for cleaning things, or for other purposes. There are many kinds of spirit.
If you enter into the spirit of something, you take part in it in an enthusiastic way.

entry.tran: 精神上(在某地或和某人在一起，但实际上本人并不在场)
entry.def: If you say you are somewhere in spirit or with someone in spirit, you mean that although you are not with them, you feel as though you are with them because you are thinking about them a lot.

example.ex: In spirit I was with you here.
example.tran: 我在精神上支持你。

entry.def: You use in spirit when you are talking about someone's true nature.

example.ex: They seemed close in spirit to those first independent-minded Turkish women who took professions...
example.tran: 她们在本质上似乎和那些最早出去工作的具有独立思想的土耳其女性很相似。

example.ex: It is independent in spirit.
example.tran: 它本质上是独立的。

entry.def: The spirit of the age or the spirit of the times is the set of ideas, beliefs, and aims that is typical of people in a particular period in history.

means.word_mean: 1. the vital principle or animating force within living things
2. the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people;

sentences.sentence: "the feel of the city excited him"
"a clergyman improved the tone of the meeting"

means.word_mean: 3. a fundamental emotional and activating principle determining one's character
4. any incorporeal supernatural being that can become visible (or audible) to human beings
5. the state of a person's emotions (especially with regard to pleasure or dejection);

sentences.sentence: "his emotional state depended on her opinion"

means.word_mean: 6. the intended meaning of a communication
7. animation and energy in action or expression;

sentences.sentence: "it was a heavy play and the actors tried in vain to give life to it"

means.word_mean: 8. an inclination or tendency of a certain kind;

auth_sentence.content: The King's spirit seems to drift across Beware.
auth_sentence.res_content: The King's spirit seems to drift across Beware.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The King's spirit seems to drift across Beware.

auth_sentence.content: Strong team spirit, trustworthy, flexible and meticulous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Strong team spirit, trustworthy, flexible and meticulous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Strong team spirit, trustworthy, flexible and meticulous.

auth_sentence.content: Is t this the basic spirit of western law?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is t this the basic spirit of western law?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is t this the basic spirit of western law?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"……人"; 2. 表抽象名词

stems_affixes.word_buile: band匪帮+it……人→n.土匪,盗匪,歹徒
herm孤独+it……人→n.隐士,修道者
pund学问+it……人→n.权威人士,专家
re再+cru成长+it……人→n.新兵,新分子,新会员 v.补充,征募,征募新兵,复原

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赤字,逆差;亏损,亏空;不足,缺乏
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,不+fic做+it-it,表抽象名词→做得不够→亏空;不足
pursue追赶+it-it,表抽象名词→n.追赶,追求;职业,工作
spir呼吸,精神+it-it,表抽象名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精

stems_affixes.value_cn: 补充,征募,征募新兵,复原
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+cru成长+it……人→n.新兵,新分子,新会员 v.补充,征募,征募新兵,复原
cred信任+it表抽象名词→ v.信任;学分

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
aspire渴望+ation表名词→n.渴望,热望
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
perspire[v.出汗]+ation结果→n.出汗
respire[v.呼吸]+ation表名词→n.呼吸
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
con共同+spir呼吸+e→同呼吸→同谋
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
re再次+spir呼吸,精神+e→v.呼吸
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏

abbreviation.mean_cn: 销售处理交互式实时总量计算技术

Sentence.sentence: With Mr Jobs gone, Apple is just one of many technology firms trying to arouse his uncontrollable spirit in new products.
It helps to create team spirit
teaching can be designed to promote boys'eam spirit
He was happy to see the return of the do-it-yourself spirit in America.
But such a Darwinian spirit is beginning to give way as at least a few colleges face up to the graduation gap.

sentences.en: Cancer destroyed her body but not her spirit.
sentences.cn: 癌症摧残了她的身体, 却摧毁不了她的精神。

sentences.en: The article breathes the spirit of the age.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章反映出时代精神。

sentences.en: He was one of the spirits in heaven.
He felt in excellent spirits when he arrived home.
sentences.cn: 他回到家里时情绪非常好。

sentences.en: The grocer sells wine and spirits.
sentences.cn: 这位食品商出售葡萄酒和烈性酒。

means.word_mean: 神秘地带走；拐走；绑架(off， away)

sentences.en: The fact is that Paul kidnapped him and spirited him back to Russia.
sentences.cn: 事实是, 保罗绑架了他并把他秘密地带回俄罗斯去了。

sentences.en: I spirited him with a cup of coffee.
sentences.cn: 我用一杯咖啡让他清醒起来。

sentences.en: He was spirited up against his boss.
sentences.cn: 他被鼓动得与他的老板作对。

jushi.english: Cancer destroyed her body but not her spirit.
jushi.chinese: 癌症摧残了她的身体,却毁不了她的精神。

jushi.english: Her spirits were dashed by the incident.
jushi.chinese: 她因为那件事而心情沮丧。

jushi.english: If the spirit of Caesar could be called up by some spell,I wonder what it would think of the present-day world.
jushi.chinese: 如果恺撒的鬼魂可以用符咒召回的话,我不知道它对当今世界会有什么看法。
